Input data in the forecasting model includes gridded weather data from the European Commission Joint Research Centre (JRC). These data contains meteorological variables from weather stations interpolated on a 25km × 25km grid and are available via the Agri4Cast Data Portal (agri4cast.jrc.ec.europa.eu/DataPortal/). The variables maximum air temperature (°C), minimum air temperature (°C), mean air temperature (°C), sum of precipitation (mm/day) and vapour pressure (hPa) were used in the Forecasting model.
